attributes.action: Every current sitting Member of Parliament should resign over the expenses scandal.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the disgrace of the mp's expenses scandal has left me, and everyone i talk to with the impression that all mp,s have entered parliament for one reason and one reason only, personal gain. the general consensus of opinion is that not one single m.p. can any longer be trusted. they are a disgrace to the office they hold.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
